text: What’s the current status of `in` to check whether a point is in a polygon? And does it work for Shapefile polygons yet? I’m not really sure it made it past the move to GeometryBasics. <@U66SGEWAC>

elements.text: to check whether a point is in a polygon? And does it work for Shapefile polygons yet? I’m not really sure it made it past the move to GeometryBasics.

text: Shapefile hasn't moved to GeometryBasics yet, so it still has it's own geometry types.

elements.text: Shapefile hasn't moved to GeometryBasics yet, so it still has it's own geometry types.

text: Not sure if `in` works for point in polygon in GeometryBasics. Point in polygon exists here as well: <https://github.com/JuliaGeometry/PolygonOps.jl>

elements.text: works for point in polygon in GeometryBasics. Point in polygon exists here as well:
